p: Another antiviral drug, nelfinavir, an HIV protease inhibitor, was predicted to be a potential inhibitor of COVID-19 [ 26]. In addition, cytokine immunotherapy with IFN-α, a broad spectrum antiviral drug, has been used to inhibit HBV. IFN-α was used to treat patients infected with SARS-CoV-2 according to established guidelines [ 70]. IFN-α combined with LPV/r was shown to be beneficial for treatment of COVID-19 [ 78].
